skill.name: clinvar-database
skill.description: Query NCBI ClinVar for variant clinical significance. Search by gene/position, interpret pathogenicity classifications, access via E-utilities API or FTP, annotate VCFs, for genomic medicine.
skill.summary: Query NCBI ClinVar for variant clinical significance. Search by gene/position, interpret pathogenici...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The skill is documentation-only and contains no executable code. It includes network download examples and a remote script install command that could be unsafe if run without verification.

medium_findings.title: Remote script install command in docs
medium_findings.description: The documentation instructs: `sh -c "$(curl -fsSL ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/entrezdirect/install-edirect.sh)"`. This downloads and executes a remote script; if the source is compromised, an attacker could run arbitrary code on a user machine.

content.value_statement: ClinVar data is spread across web, API, and bulk files. This skill gives clear queries, interpretation guidance, and download paths for reliable analysis.
actual_capabilities: Provide ClinVar search patterns for web and E-utilities queries
Explain clinical significance terms and review status stars
Describe ClinVar FTP directory structure and update schedule
List data formats and key fields for XML, VCF, and tab-delimited files
Outline example commands for VCF annotation and filtering
limitations: Does not fetch live ClinVar data or run queries
Does not provide medical diagnosis or clinical decisions
Requires external tools and network access for downloads
Large downloads require local storage and compute

use_cases.title: Gene variant review
use_cases.description: Formulate ClinVar queries for a gene and interpret review status before downstream analysis.

use_cases.title: Classification clarification
use_cases.description: Understand ClinVar pathogenicity terms and handle conflicting interpretations with appropriate caution.

use_cases.title: Pipeline planning
use_cases.description: Plan downloads and file formats for VCF annotation and periodic database refreshes.

prompt_templates.title: Find a gene query
prompt_templates.prompt: Provide a ClinVar web query for BRCA1 pathogenic variants and explain the query fields.

prompt_templates.title: Explain VUS meaning
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain what VUS means in ClinVar and how review status affects confidence.

prompt_templates.title: Prepare FTP download
prompt_templates.prompt: List FTP paths for the latest ClinVar XML and GRCh38 VCF and summarize the update schedule.

prompt_templates.title: Annotate a VCF
prompt_templates.prompt: Outline steps and example commands to annotate a VCF with ClinVar and filter pathogenic variants.

output_examples.input: Find high confidence pathogenic CFTR variants and explain how to prioritize them.
output: Use a ClinVar query with CFTR[gene] and pathogenic[CLNSIG], then filter for expert panel or practice guideline review status
Prioritize variants with three or four stars and no conflicting interpretations
Record the ClinVar release date and genome build used

best_practices: Check review status and prefer higher star ratings
Record ClinVar release version and access date
Match genome build between your data and ClinVar VCF
anti_patterns: Treating VUS as diagnostic without expert review
Mixing GRCh37 and GRCh38 coordinates in one analysis

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. It is text guidance and works in Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the main limits of the skill?
faq.answer: It does not run queries, fetch data, or provide medical diagnosis.

faq.question: Can it integrate with bioinformatics pipelines?
faq.answer: It provides file format guidance and example commands for VCF annotation and bulk downloads.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No. It only provides instructions and does not collect, store, or transmit user data.

faq.question: What should I do if an API request fails?
faq.answer: Check query syntax, respect rate limits, and retry with exponential backoff.

faq.question: How does this compare to the ClinVar website?
faq.answer: It adds structured query patterns, interpretation tips, and download guidance in one place.
